name: Get the fuel
description:
You are driving in a red car and need more fuel to go on vacation. Gather more fuel cans but make sure not to run out of fuel while doing it. Each fuel can gives you 1 fuel point (the black counter) and 1 point for total amount of fuel cans collected (the red counter) Use up and down arrow keys to move the car, but lose a fuel point every time you press the up or down key. If you lose all fuel points, it's game over. Get all 7 fuel cans to win!

Gamejolt version: https://chocolatecookiebro.itch.io/get-the-fuel

Collecting all full music: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/tropical-keys/1219

BG music: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/crazy-crowd/1034
